item.title: GDPR Compliant Alternative to Google Fonts
item.description: As you probably already know or in case you don’t, google fonts is no longer legal in Europe. This is due to the GDPR, which is a regulation for applications serving Europe, so that platforms do not collect user information without making it clear.
